docs.title: ThreatScope
docs.text:
ThreatScope is a lightweight web app to explore your cyber threat landscape. Select your industry and operating countries, then see the threat actors, malware, and risks most relevant to your context.

Status: Prototype / demo (mock data). Ideal for product/content recruitment tests.

docs.title: Stack
docs.text:
• FastAPI for HTTP & templating glue (Jinja)
  • HTMX for server-driven updates (partial swap)
  • Tailwind (CDN) for styling
  • uv for dependency + venv management

docs.title: Data Model (mock)
docs.text:
• INDUSTRIES: list[str]
  • COUNTRIES: list[{ code: str, name: str }]
  • MOCK_THREATS: list[{ id, name, type, risk, industries, countries, description }]

docs.title: Add a New Threat
docs.text: Edit app/data.py → MOCK_THREATS list. Optionally expand the scoring logic or filters.
